title: 100th time getting disconnected
body: Riot come on please fix the server disconnection issue..for like a week or two every other day we getting this issue the same issue...please

replies.body: You dare accuse riot of anything other then perfection, you scum. Next time think before you speak.

uninstall windows 10 update. it worked for me.

the only reason I am here telling you is because I am in the leave buster penalty box....lol
Nah mate,fuck W10 Xd I have windows 7

There haven't been any issues recently kicking players out of games, that I've seen.  It sounds like your network can't hold onto a connection to the game server, which would ultimately end up with a disconnection.  I suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to tune up your network and make sure everything is running in order.  Hope that helps gets you back in game!

It is not only me...we were 4 people premade won the game and then instead of showing the end game screen (scores etc etc) we waited a bit and nothing happened so we pressed the "Skip waiting for stats" after that we all 4 got disconnected from the chat and we also got some kind of error..i do not remember what exactly but when we pressed OK our game just closed..when we logged in again the client was a bit laggy but after we played a game it was OK...so yeah..
